chapter.title: Preconfigured runtime environment
chapter.p: This is a preconfigured Tomcat environment for use with Carrot2 components. Just download the component WARs, throw them in the context-components directory of this runtime and start Tomcat!

chapter.title: Nightly component binaries
chapter.p: These binaries (WAR files) are provided as part of the nightly demo/ integration build. We cannot guarantee these files will work because they are development shapshots. These binaries are provided mostly for use in other projects (i.e. Egothor).
